import React, { FC, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import '../../styles/Shop/DropDownMenu.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCheck, faClose } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' interface DropDownMenuProps { typeOfFilter: string handleSortByFilter: Function, sortByFilterOption: string, handleCategoryFilter: Function, categoryFilterOption: string, products: any, setCategoryFilterOpen: any, setPriceFilterOpen: any, priceFilterOption: string, handlePriceFilter: Function, } const DropDownMenu: FC = ({ typeOfFilter, handleSortByFilter, sortByFilterOption, categoryFilterOption, handleCategoryFilter, products, setCategoryFilterOpen, handlePriceFilter, priceFilterOption, setPriceFilterOpen }) => { return (
{typeOfFilter !== 'Sort By' && (
Results: {products.length} items
{setCategoryFilterOpen(false); setPriceFilterOpen(false)}}> Close
)} {typeOfFilter === 'Sort By' && (
  • handleSortByFilter('Top Rated', products)}>Top Rated {sortByFilterOption === 'Top Rated' ? : null}
  • handleSortByFilter('Low to high', products)}>Price: Low to high {sortByFilterOption === 'Low to high' ? : null}
  • handleSortByFilter('High to low', products)}>Price: High to low {sortByFilterOption === 'High to low' ? : null}
)} {typeOfFilter === 'Category' && (

Categories

)} {typeOfFilter === 'Price' && (

Categories

)}
) } export default DropDownMenu
